creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: apron with two pairs of ties; front hem has five separate rectangles attached at corners, with two rows of nut or shell pendant fringe; red, white, blue and yellow floral and geometric embroidery
dimension: 18 1/4 x 14 in. (46.36 x 35.56 cm) (without ties or fringe)
inscription: Inscription, LLC on back, in black ink: untranslated inscription
title: Apron
